articles.description: President Joe Biden was sworn in on a 19th century family Bible on Wednesday, continuing his longtime tradition of using the heirloom during his decades of public service.
articles.content:
Washington (CNN)President Joe Biden was sworn in on a 19th century family Bible on Wednesday, continuing his longtime tradition of using the heirloom during his decades of public service.

articles.description: President Joe Biden gives a speech after being sworn in as the 46th President of the United States. See more moments from the inauguration.

articles.title: Youth poet laureate recites stunning poem at Biden inauguration
articles.description: Amanda Gorman, the United States' first-ever youth poet laureate, recited a powerful poem at the inauguration of President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris. See more videos on the CNN inauguration page.

articles.title: Amanda Gorman calls on Americans to 'leave behind a country better than the one we were left' in powerful inauguration poem

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Marijuana abuse by youth with mood disorders linked to suicide attempts, self-harm and death, study finds
articles.description: Heavy use of marijuana by teens and young adults with mood disorders -- such as depression and bipolar disorder -- is linked to an increased risk of self-harm, suicide attempts and death, a new study has found.

articles.author: Jomana Karadsheh and Mostafa Salem, CNN
articles.title: 43 people drown after migrant boat capsizes in the Mediterranean
articles.description: Forty-three people died and 10 were rescued after a boat carrying West African migrants capsized off the Libyan coast on Tuesday, the International Organization for Migration (IOM) and UNHCR said in a Wednesday statement.

articles.author: Adrian Lydon, CNN Business
articles.title: This 'snake robot' can fix pipelines on the ocean floor
articles.description: Eelume is a six-meter-long, snake-like robot that will maintain oil and gas pipelines deep beneath the sea.

articles.title: Trump's lonely exit

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Here's how much Trump's presidential pension is worth -- if he keeps it
articles.description: As of noon today, Donald Trump is entitled to an annual pension of $221,400 and perks worth far more than that.

articles.title: Kamala Harris was escorted to the ceremony by the Capitol Police officer who led rioters away from senate
articles.description: US Capitol Police Officer Eugene Goodman has been hailed as a hero ever since he lured rioters away from the Senate chambers during the January 6 insurrection on Capitol Hill. His courageous actions were recognized again on Wednesday..
